name: Dragon2D
tagline: A more or less smalle 2D RPG engine
body:
### Welcome to Dragon2D - a RPG engine written in D

While this page is new and not filled with all the information, this will be the main resource for everything related to Dragon2D. You will find tutorials, documentation and maybe some demos here. Also the basic concepts of the engine live here. 

### Where to go?

to be added. SOON.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
